author: potuz
content:
Someone posted this on the LH Discord
```
There’s no way for you to re-activate your validator, and you won’t be able to transfer or withdraw your funds until the merge (which means your funds will remain inaccessible until then).
```
Which is in the official Launchpad. <https://launchpad.ethereum.org/en/faq>
Perhaps the EF can avoid mixing withdrawals and the merge since there may be lots of people complaining when the merge comes and there's no withdrawals
